DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study 1 ) assess foot strike pattern initially , six month one year two group runner attempt transition non-rearfoot strike pattern ( NRFS ) without use biofeedback technology , 2 ) prospectively compare injury incidence rate one year NRFS rearfoot strike ( RFS ) runner .
DOC.brief_title: Using Real Time Biofeedback Alter Running Mechanics
DOC.criteria: 1 . Between age 18 50 year 2 . Run average 12mi per week 3 . DOD beneficiary intend remain West Point , NY next 12 month time study enrollment 4 . Read speak English well enough provide inform consent follow study instruction 1 . Known pregnancy currently previous 6 month 2 . Lower extremity low back pain previous 3 month 3 . Lower extremity low back surgery previous 6 month 4 . Any low extremity low back exercise limiting profile 5 . Previous stress fracture foot 6 . Participant nonrearfoot strike run pattern
